text:
A network connection failure usually causes this error and if you try to repeat the operation immediately it’ll still fail. It’s a temporary error, you should wait for 2 or 3 minutes before attempting to pull the model again. Then some minutes later, the operation will success.
Added by Eduardo Muñoz
question: Ollama: “Error: pull model manifest: 503: no healthy upstream” when pulling a model with Ollama
